「渔获」.desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

「究极霸王超级魔剑」.desc: A magical sword that can only be wielded by the ultimate overlord who rules the seas. As it has been made with special water-resistant materials, it will not get ruined by water damage even after being immersed. Why, one might even call it invincible!
「究极霸王超级魔剑」.JP: 「スーパーアルティメット覇王魔剣」

万世流涌大典.desc: A manual that was once passed down from generation to generation within an underwater priory. Today, none know of its existence.

万国诸海图谱.desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

不灭月华.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

且住亭御咄.desc: Once upon a time, there was a youkai that roamed Inazuma in the form of a lantern's flame. This must once have been one of its vessels.

东花坊时雨.desc: A rather special oil-paper umbrella. While long wanderings may make one used to the wind and the rain, there might be some fun in admiring a rainy scene beneath this parasol.

乘浪的回旋.desc: A boomerang made from the fangs of a giant sea serpent. It was a rare weapon indeed that the giant Tupac would call "trusty."

以理服人.desc: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.

佣兵重剑.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

便携动力锯.desc: An old-school power saw that you can rarely find nowadays. It was once a cutting tool trusted by workers all around.

信使.desc: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

公义的酬报.desc: A sharp spear. Only its tip remains freshly bloodstained.

最初的大魔术.desc: A stage prop once used by a past "Great Magician." Its final secret was that it was also a weapon beyond the pale.

冬极白星.desc: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

冲浪时光.desc: A commemorative item originally reserved for the champion of the "First All-Tribe Surfing Championship." Since said tournament is currently in the preparatory stage, the prize is in temporary storage at the Leisurely Puffer, with the shop owner as its custodian.

决斗之枪.desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

冷刃.desc: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

冷寂迸音.desc: A mechanical longbow purpose-built for long shots and silent kills. Its twang is swallowed up amidst the night, the note lengthy and cold.

勘探钻机.desc: A long-handled drill that you can rarely find nowadays. It was often used in delving and in carving stones.
勘探钻机.JP: プロスペクタードリル

匣里日月.desc: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.

匣里灭辰.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

匣里龙吟.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

千夜浮梦.desc: This lamp illuminates the dreams that float up over a thousand nights, and in its emerald-green light flows a song of ancient days.

千岩古剑.desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

千岩长枪.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.

厄水之祸.desc: A ceremonial blade forged by Sanhaj, the great high priest of the Masters of the Night-Wind. In tales of bygone days, Sanhaj could use this curved blade to perform rituals, blurring the boundary between the Night Kingdom and the present world.

历练的猎弓.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

原木刀.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a blade that can cut down the foes of the forest.

反曲弓.desc: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.

口袋魔导书.desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

吃虎鱼刀.desc: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

和璞鸢.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

喜多院十文字.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.

嘟嘟可故事集.desc: A children's book filled with childish short stories at which one cannot help but laugh.\nEven those readers who have long reached adulthood cannot help but be absorbed by the innocent, naive little adventures portrayed within.

四风原典.desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.
四风原典.EN: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

图莱杜拉的回忆.desc: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crisp as they are distant.
图莱杜拉的回忆.JP: トゥライトゥーラの記憶

圣显之钥.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. They say that this can be used as a key to open the gate to a paradise that lies at the end of the ocean of sand.

圣缚.desc: A glorious, illusory catalyst that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its user. Legend has it that this catalyst once held the name "Gleipnir" when it was used by an oracle-issuing sinner in an ancient land.

圣缚·真化.desc: A glorious, illusory catalyst glimmering with the power of "Time" that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its user. Legend has it that this catalyst once held the name "Gleipnir" when it was used by a transcendent sinner in an ancient land.

天目影打刀.desc: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.

天空之傲.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

天空之刃.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

天空之卷.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

天空之翼.desc: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.

天空之脊.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

学徒笔记.desc: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.

宗室大剑.desc: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by the nobility only.

宗室猎枪.desc: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.

宗室秘法录.desc: A book that once belonged to a court mage of Mondstadt who served the nobility. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.

宗室长剑.desc: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.

宗室长弓.desc: An old longbow that belonged to the erstwhile aristocratic rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.

寝正月初晴.desc: A bell lantern forged from purple jade. They say it brings sweet dreams when placed beside one's pillow.

尘世之锁.desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.

山王长牙.desc: A giant sword forged from pure turquoise. Due to its greater weight than most ordinary weapons, it was named for Kongomato the Mountain King.

岩峰巡歌.desc: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.

峡湾长歌.desc: A polearm used by those seeking to catch fish in the tundra. It lets none escape.

幽夜华尔兹.desc: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.

异世界行记.desc: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.

弓藏.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.

弥坚骨.desc: A longsword made of bone that has only grown harder after being hit and swung countless times. It is said that this was the hero Wanjiru's reliable weapon.

弹弓.desc: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.

忍冬之果.desc: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.

息灾.desc: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

息燧之笛.desc: A peculiarly shaped jade longsword that has been passed down amongst the Masters of the Night-Wind as a "priestly flute."

恶王丸.desc: The beloved sword of the legendary "Akuou." The blade is huge and majestic, but is surprisingly easy to wield.

护摩之杖.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

拾慧铸熔.desc: Tribal tales tell of a great blade forged by the People of the Springs to protect a child who would embark on a distant journey. This particular weapon appears to be a replica of that legendary sword.

掠食者.desc: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.

撼地者.desc: A heavy blade that people claim was beloved by the hero known as the Firethief. They say that even the Lord of Cinder Keep's flames could not burn it away.

支离轮光.desc: A spinning mechanical blade produced by the Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop that seems to hide secrets from a bygone era...

斫峰之刃.desc: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

断浪长鳍.desc: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.

新手长枪.desc: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.

旅行剑.desc: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.

无垠蔚蓝之歌.desc: An anthology of exquisite poetry. It contains quite a few poems beloved by Mondstadters, concerning the skies, dandelions, and other such topics.

无工之剑.desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.

无锋剑.desc: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

星鹫赤羽.desc: An ancient longbow crested with red feathers, a sacred relic of the Flower-Feather Clan that has been passed down from generation to generation.

昭心.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.

暗巷猎手.desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

暗巷的酒与诗.desc: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.
暗巷的酒与诗.JP: ダークアレイの酒と詩

暗巷闪光.desc: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.

暗铁剑.desc: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.

曚云之月.desc: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.

有乐御簾切.desc: This famous blade was once created by the hand of Urakusai, the renowned literatus. Legend has it that it has never cut any living creature in all these hundreds of years.

木棉之环.desc: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.

松籁响起之时.desc: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless to the corrupt as a typhoon.

柔灯挽歌.desc: A magnificent polearm adorned with azure crystal. It is said to have been a certain legendary Champion Duelist's treasure — and yet, not once was it ever used.

桂木斩长正.desc: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.

森林王器.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a greatsword that shall cut down the foes of the forest.

水仙十字之剑.desc: A sword whose power faded when the story ended. It will now embark upon a new journey with the power that remains within it, which commemorates a certain great dream.

沐浴龙血的剑.desc: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

沙中伟贤的对答.desc: A caduceus symbolizing the glory of alchemy, made from special alloys to match its special status. It is exceedingly rigid and heavy, and would probably hurt pretty bad if used as a cudgel.

波乱月白经津.desc: A famed work by the Futsu line of smiths. The name "Haran" comes from the manner in which it resembles the violent, roiling waves.

流月针.desc: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.

流浪乐章.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

流浪的晚星.desc: This was originally a device used by researchers to observe and perform calculations on celestial phenomena. It serves as a conduit and catalyst.

测距规.desc: A measuring instrument that you can rarely find nowadays. It is capable of firing arrows.

浪影阔剑.desc: An exquisitely-crafted, standard-model sword forged for the high-ranking officers and flagship captains of Fontaine's old navy.

海渊终曲.desc: This longsword is as silent as the mysterious ocean depths. It is even more ancient than its stylings might imply.

溢彩心念.desc: A trophy made from gemstones from the Collective of Plenty and crystals from the Flower-Feather Clan. It is said to have once belonged to a legendary wrestler.
溢彩心念.JP: ヴィヴィッド・ハート

灰河渡手.desc: A handy length of abandoned copper pipe that was once used as a weapon. It was famous — or infamous, depending — in some circles.

烈阳之嗣.desc: An ancient longbow that is a remnant of King Deshret's ancient era. An indecipherable ancient text and solemn patterns have been carved into it.

焚曜千阳.desc: A greatsword that dazzles like the rising sun. It has witnessed the extinguishing and rekindling of innumerable suns.

狼牙.desc: Legend has it that this longsword was once used by a wandering knight in the distant past.

狼的末路.desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

猎人之径.desc: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.

猎弓.desc: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

王下近侍.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow that can shoot the enemies of the forest down.

玛海菈的水色.desc: An ancient greatsword that gleams like the waters themselves. A thousand years of sand erosion has not dulled its unnaturally sharp edge one bit.

甲级宝珏.desc: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.

白影剑.desc: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.

白缨枪.desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

白辰之环.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.

白铁大剑.desc: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

白雨心弦.desc: Legendary bow of the fairies. Whether on the stage or the battlefield, it can easily touch the hearts of the listener.

盈满之实.desc: A fruit you obtained from an Aranara tale. It holds the potential to conquer any crisis.

破魔之弓.desc: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

硕果钩.desc: Bold Burkina from the Scions of the Canopy once made this weapon with the hero Tenoch's help — all for the sake of obtaining Flamegranates unmatched throughout Natlan.

碎月.desc: A glorious, illusory polearm that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its wielder. Legend has it that this polearm once held the name "Barnstokkr" when it was wielded by a moon-hunting sinner in an ancient land.

碎月·真化.desc: A glorious, illusory polearm glimmering with the power of "Death" that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its wielder. Legend has it that this polearm once held the name "Barnstokkr" when it was wielded by a transcendent sinner in an ancient land.

碎链.desc: A jade-adorned longbow. The gentle winds always seem to swirl gently about its string. Legends claim that this weapon was made in a far more ancient era by a dragon artisan.

碧落之珑.desc: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.

磐岩结绿.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

神乐之真意.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

神射手之誓.desc: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.
神射手之誓.JP: シャープシューターの誓い

祭星者之望.desc: A statue carved in the shape of an eagle, a sacred relic of the Masters of the Night-Wind that has been passed down from generation to generation.

祭礼剑.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

祭礼大剑.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

祭礼弓.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

祭礼残章.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

竭泽.desc: This seems to be a now-extinct fish. Its body is sufficiently elastic that a string may be attached to it to let it serve as a bow.

笛剑.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

笼钓瓶一心.desc: This famed blade was born in a nation to the far north. But in the name of "Isshin," it was stained with many a dark deed on its home-bound journey.

筑云.desc: A prototype for a standard-issue weapon the Yuheng commissioned from Blackcliff Forge after having analyzed the ancient mechanisms that protected the adeptal abode upon Tianheng.

纯水流华.desc: A strangely-shaped anthology of scripts. All the scripts written by Coppelius are recorded within.

终末嗟叹之诗.desc: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.

绝弦.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.

缀花之翎.desc: A longbow that burns like a flame. The feathers that adorn it are said to have come from the ancient tyrant Ngoubou.

翡玉法球.desc: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."

聊聊棒.desc: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

腐殖之剑.desc: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.

船坞长剑.desc: A convenient cutting tool that you can rarely find nowadays. You can replace the blades as they are dulled by usage.

苇海信标.desc: A large, flat-tipped sword designed in to fit as the weapon of an ancient king or some ceremonial instrument.

苍古自由之誓.desc: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.
苍古自由之誓.JP: 蒼古なる自由への誓い

苍纹角杯.desc: A ritual vessel passed down amongst the Meztli. They say that this was once a treasure much-valued, yet never used, by the hero "Giant" Tupac.

苍翠猎弓.desc: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.

苍耀.desc: This blade was once pure and pristine as a white dawn star, but it has since been tinted a deep, dark blue.

若水.desc: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.

落霞.desc: A precious bow made of platinum, inlaid with an orb that shimmers with the light of eventide.

薙草之稻光.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

虹的行迹.desc: A keen polearm forged from jade. It gives off rainbow-hued light when exposed to sunlight.

蛇噬.desc: A glorious, illusory sword that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its wielder. Legend has it that this sword once held the name "Logseims" when it was wielded by a golden sinner in an ancient land.

蛇噬·真化.desc: A glorious, illusory sword glimmering with the power of "Life" that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its wielder. Legend has it that this sword once held the name "Logseims" when it was wielded by a transcendent sinner in an ancient land.

螭骨剑.desc: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

衔珠海皇.desc: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.

裁叶萃光.desc: This gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used to destroy countless poisons that infested the forest.

裁断.desc: A weapon once used by a young maiden who forsook her family name, stained with the blood of enemies and loved ones both.

西福斯的月光.desc: This ancient double-edged sword glimmers with moonlight. It is said that a now-silent Jinni dwells within it.
西福斯的月光.JP: サイフォスの月明かり

西风剑.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

西风大剑.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

西风猎弓.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

西风秘典.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

西风长枪.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

讨龙英杰谭.desc: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.

训练大剑.desc: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

证誓之明瞳.desc: A national treasure of Byakuyakoku stored in the Dainichi Mikoshi. With the coming of the Serpent God, this item was used to notarize great oaths and wishes.

试作古华.desc: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

试作斩岩.desc: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

试作星镰.desc: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

试作澹月.desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

试作金珀.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

贯星.desc: A glorious, illusory bow that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its wielder. Legend has it that this bow once held the name "Gusisnautar" when it was wielded by a foul sinner in an ancient land.

贯星·真化.desc: A glorious, illusory bow glimmering with the power of "Void" that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its wielder. Legend has it that this bow once held the name "Gusisnautar" when it was wielded by a transcendent sinner in an ancient land.

贯月矢.desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It is shaped like a giant arrow and can be used as a spear.

贯虹之槊.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.

赤月之形.desc: A keen-edged weapon, luster dazzling as the crimson moon. It is said that an ancient dynasty once regarded it as a ritual object that could bridge two worlds, but none still remember the beliefs and ceremonies of that bygone age.

赤沙之杖.desc: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. Legend has it that these staves grant the right to lead the people of the desert, but no retainer now lives who can verify the proper appearance of these regalia.

赤角石溃杵.desc: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the "Mighty Redhorn Stoic Stonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord" that can send any monster packing with its tail between its legs.

赦罪.desc: A rapier once wielded by a deceiver who had forsaken everything. In the past, it was primarily used as a tool when he had to disguise his identity.

赫烈.desc: A glorious, illusory claymore that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its wielder. Legend has it that this claymore once held the name "Starkuthr" when it was wielded by an wise sinner in an ancient land.

赫烈·真化.desc: A glorious, illusory claymore glimmering with the power of "Reason" that emerged from the depths of the Ley Lines. It can change its appearance based on the Elemental Type of its wielder. Legend has it that this claymore once held the name "Starkuthr" when it was wielded by a transcendent sinner in an ancient land.

辰砂之纺锤.desc: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power within might even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode a mighty dragon.

遗祀玉珑.desc: An ancient jade pendant that gleams like clear water. It seems to have been used in ancient ceremonies.

金流监督.desc: A floating device that can monitor certain phenomena. It was picked up and modified to serve other purposes following its abandonment.

钟剑.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.

钢轮弓.desc: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.

钺矛.desc: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

铁尖枪.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

铁影阔剑.desc: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.

铁蜂刺.desc: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

银剑.desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

镇山之钉.desc: This polearm was once jointly forged by the craftsmen in the mines as a sacrifice to the spirits of the mountains.

阿莫斯之弓.desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

降临之剑.desc: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.

雨裁.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.

雪葬的星银.desc: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

雾切之回光.desc: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.

静水流涌之辉.desc: A scepter around which swirls pure water. In days long past, it once symbolized the highest authority over the seas.

静谧之曲.desc: A strange longbow that resembles a sea creature. Its string makes no sound at all.

风信之锋.desc: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on the breeze remains a gentle thing...

风花之颂.desc: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.

风鹰剑.desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.

飞天大御剑.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.

飞天御剑.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

飞雷之弦振.desc: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.

饰铁之花.desc: A graceful and elegant greatsword that is decorated with flowers and ribbons.

香韵奏者.desc: An elegantly built polearm, said to have been a conductor's baton wielded by a great musician to bridge tune and taste.
香韵奏者.JP: 香りのシンフォニスト

魔导绪论.desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

鸦羽弓.desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

鹤鸣余音.desc: A fan carved from pure jade, around which swirls an ancient aura of adeptal energy.

鹮穿之喙.desc: A golden bow forged from the description in the story. If you use it as a normal weapon, you can also view it as a part of a fictional world that has made it off the pages.

黎明神剑.desc: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

黑剑.desc: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.

黑岩刺枪.desc: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.

黑岩战弓.desc: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.

黑岩斩刀.desc: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to pommel.

黑岩绯玉.desc: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.

黑岩长剑.desc: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.

黑缨枪.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

龙脊长枪.desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.
